text: Alexander McEachian Gallacher (1 January 1954 â€“ 29 August 2021) was a Scottish-born Australian politician. He was a Senator for South Australia from 2011 until his death in 2021. He was a member of the Australian Labor Party (ALP). Gallacher was born in New Cumnock, Scotland. Gallacher was diagnosed with lung cancer in January 2020. He died on 29 August 2021 from the disease, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== *Parliamentary Profile: Australian Parliament website *Parliamentary Profile: Labor website *Summary of parliamentary voting for Senator Alex Gallacher on TheyVoteForYou.org.au Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian Labor Party politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia
title: Alex Gallacher
